text: North Chotanagpur division is one of the five divisions in the Indian state of Jharkhand. The division comprises the following districts: Bokaro district, Chatra district, Dhanbad district, Giridih district, Hazaribagh district, Koderma district and Ramgarh district. It was earlier part of Chota Nagpur Division. ==Languages== ==References== Category:Geography of Jharkhand Category:Divisions of Jharkhand
title: North Chotanagpur division
